sentences.sContent: Now detectives are appealing for witnesses who may have seen anything suspicious last night.
sentences.sCn: 现在侦探们正在呼吁昨晚可能看到任何可疑情况的人出来作证。

sentences.sContent: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.sCn: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

sentences.sContent: ...What is the key to write a good classical detective story according to the man...

words.tran: 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉

trans.tranCn: 侦探，警探；私人侦探，私家侦探
trans.tranOther: a police officer whose job is to discover information about crimes and catch criminals
